entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Blowing snow with visibilities at times less than 2 kilometres this afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Thursday 21 April 2016
